imdb.title: Uchouten Kazoku
imdb.plot: In Kyoto there are three kinds of residents: humans, tanuki and tengu. Shimogamo Yasaburou is the third son of the Shimogamo tanuki family. His father was eaten by members of the "Friday Club" and now he approaches the truth of hi...

episodes.title: The Nidaime's Homecoming
episodes.plot: The 3rd son of the Shimogamo tanuki family, Yasaburou Shimogamo enjoys his busy life as a tanuki. One day, he goes in Mt. Nyoigatake to look for one of UMA, tsuchinoko, with his little brother Yashirou.

episodes.title: Tenmaya the Illusionist
episodes.plot: Yasaburou had a hectic night with Yakushibou aka Akadama-sensei and Yakushibou the second. Next day, when Yasaburou tends an antique shop, the owner asks him for a sudden job.

episodes.title: The Scent of Europe
episodes.plot: Yasaburou and his mother Tousen head to Tanukidanisan Fudo-in Temple where Tousen's mother lives. They ask her to prepare a medicine for Yajirou.

episodes.title: The Tanuki Shogi Tournament
episodes.plot: Benten argued with Yakushibou the second immediately after she returned from abroad - this story spreads in the society of tanuki. Meanwhile, Shogi tournament is held by tanukis at Nanzen-ji Temple.

episodes.title: Daimonji Leisure Cruiser Battle - Continued
episodes.plot: Shimogamo brothers have to prepare a Daimonji leisure cruiser for this year. Yaichirou tries to prepare it, however, Ebisugawa brothers disturb his effort. Yasaburou thinks up a good idea and heads to Akadama-sensei.

episodes.title: Arima Hell
episodes.plot: Yasaburou visits Professor Yodogawa who is now against Friday Club. Professor Yodogawa tells Yasaburou that Friday Club meeting will be held at an inn in Arima hot-spring resort.

episodes.title: The Friday Fellows Club, Again
episodes.plot: Yasaburou came back alive from hell by Benten's power, and then Benten invites him to Friday Club banquet. She advises him to take a bath before the banquet, and he goes to an open-air bath where members of Friday Club and professor Yodogawa are.

episodes.title: Ebisugawa Kaisei's Secret
episodes.plot: Sôun Ebisugawa's funeral is held at the Electric Wine Factory where Ebisugawa family runs. Not knowing what had happened, tanukis talk about his gossips. Tousen tells her sons what happened when he married into Ebisugawa family.

episodes.title: The Various Nidaime
episodes.plot: The day has come when Yajirou goes on a journey. Yaichirou, Yasaburou, Yashirou and Gyokuran see him off Kyoto station. Yasaburou gets sentimental, but it does not last too long. He has a new problem that Akadama-sensei refuses to observe in the election for a new leader of tanuki's society.

episodes.title: Noryo-yuka No Megami
episodes.plot: In Kyoto, there are three kinds of residents: humans, tanuki, and tengu. Shimogamo Yasaburou is the third son of the Shimogamo tanuki family. His father, Souichirou, had been the head of Kyoto tanuki community until he was eaten by the human members of "Friday Club." While taking care of an old tengu, fighting with other tanuki, and playing with a psychic human girl, Yasaburou approaches the truth of his father's death.

episodes.title: Haha to Raijin-sama
episodes.plot: Yasaburo visits Yajiro, who lives in the bottom of a well as a frog and forgot how to transform back into himself. When a storm comes, the three non-frog Shimogamo brothers race to help their mother, who is terrified of thunder.

episodes.title: Daimonji nouryousen gassen
episodes.plot: During the traditional Daimonji leisure cruise, the Ebisugawas come to pick on the Shimogamo family. Yasaburo fights bravely, but loses the Fujin Raijin folding fan. Fearing Benten's wrath, he goes into hiding after the inner parlor crashes.

episodes.title: The Friday Fellows Club
episodes.plot: Yasaburo had been hiding from Benten in Osaka, but she finds and catches him during a visit to Kyoto and makes him perform tanuki tricks for the Friday Fellows.

episodes.title: Autumn Leaf Viewing
episodes.plot: Benten and Yasaburo look at some autumn foliage with Professor Yodogawa. Yodogawa has plenty to say about philosophy of eating and tells the story of Benten and Yodogawa's first hot pot victim.

episodes.title: Bath House Rules
episodes.plot: Yasaburo, Yashiro, and Yaichiro convince Prof. Akadama to take a much-needed bath, when they run into the Ebisugawa twins. It is revealed that Yajiro was partly responsible for Soichiro's death.

episodes.title: The Day That Dad Left
episodes.plot: Yajiro tells Yasaburo and Yaichiro his account of the night their father was eaten. Later Yasaburo hears a continuation of the story Yajiro doesn't know - Soichiro bumped into Prof. Akadama on his way to the afterlife.

episodes.title: Behind the Scenes of Soun Ebisugawa
episodes.plot: The meaning of Kaisei's mysterious apology becomes clear as the Ebisugawa plot to boil Yaichiro in a hot pot is revealed on the day of the Nise-emon election. The day is also the anniversary of Soichiro's death.

episodes.title: The Eccentric Family
episodes.plot: Tanuki and human worlds collide as both the Nise-emon ceremony and Friday Fellow year-end bash descend into chaos. By New Year's everything settles down and Yasaburo and co. are able to calmly consider their hopes for the future.
